title: Dream Interpretation of Houris in a Dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.text: Seeing the Houris in a dream indicates God's blessings, the fulfillment of desires, and other interpretations. Seeing the Houris in Paradise, or kissing a Houri, or having intercourse with a Houri, or marrying Houris, according to Ibn Sirin and others on the subject: Interpretation of the Houris in a dream The Houris are a gift that God Almighty has given to the believers in Paradise for the sincere deeds they performed in the world and for their adherence to God's religion and the teachings of Islam. A place in the hereafter. Seeing poplar trees in a dream means that the dreamer will live a happy life, and the vision indicates that the dreamer will get a livelihood. Also, seeing the Houris in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have a good end after his death and God will reward him with good. This vision also indicates gaining a prestigious position and great respect among people. Seeing a poplar tree in the dream of a single person, whether a girl or a young man, is an indication of an imminent marriage or engagement or the imminent discovery of a suitable lover. The Houris in a dream indicate that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money from a legitimate source, and this vision also shows that the dreamer will obtain money through inheritance. Sitting with the Houris in a dream indicates happiness and long life, and indicates that God will grant you Paradise. Whoever sees a vision of the Houris and is going through problems or hardships of any kind, it means the arrival of relief, the end of these problems, and the finding of solutions to this difficulty. Dreaming of the Houris means that God will grant you success and you will be freed from all worries and sorrows, and whoever sees poplar trees in a dream and has committed forbidden acts, this vision means that he must repent and stop these undesirable actions. In the case of seeing a beautiful poplar tree and the dreamer is suffering from problems within the family, this dream means that he will be able to find solutions to these problems and restore harmony within the family. Whoever sees that he is with beautiful poplar trees in Paradise, this dream is good news from God that you are among the righteous who will triumph with the poplar trees. Whether whoever sees the most beautiful poplar trees on earth, this vision is a test from God for you, or a sign of an impending illness or an indication of the emergence of some problems, but all of this will be a test from God for you if you have patience and succeed in passing this test, you will be among the people of Paradise, God willing. Also, whoever sees the Houris entering a place and declaring to the dreamer that he will be wiped away from the hereafter, this vision is a message of good tidings to enter Paradise and prove his good deeds. In some cases, seeing poplar trees in a dream means that you will reach martyrdom, and seeing poplar trees also indicates light, repentance, and God's victory over your enemies. Whoever sees himself in Paradise and adorning the beautiful virgins in Paradise, this means that he will be a great person of influence, authority, and power among people. And whoever sees Paradise in a dream with its Houris or its children or its fruit, then it means that he is doing a lot of good deeds and his account with God is going smoothly. Kissing the Houris in a dream indicates beauty, majesty, and loftiness, and indicates a devoted person who works for the future and does not prefer the world over the hereafter. Similarly, whoever sees intercourse with a Houri from the virgins, it means that he is a person of religion and morals and will follow the path in which he seeks to elevate his religion and raise his banner. Interpretation of the Houris in Paradise in a dream Seeing the Houris in Paradise in a dream is a sign that God will give you great blessings and joyful surprises as a reward for your good deeds. Whoever sees beautiful eyelids in the sky in a dream, it indicates that the dreamer is a righteous person who is completely distant from forbidden things and from things that do not please God. The presence of the Houris in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will gain a place of respect, respect, and great appreciation among the people around him. Interpretation of the Houris in a dream for a man Seeing the Houris in a man's dream indicates prosperity in business and an increase in the source of income, and this vision can also indicate finding a distinguished job and earning a high salary. If a man sees the Houris in a dream, it means that he has the ability to face life with all its problems and difficulties, and he has the ability to overcome them all. Interpretation of the Houris in a dream for a divorced woman Seeing the Houris in the dream of a divorced woman is evidence of the end of crises and the end of the psychological problems she suffered from. The dream of the Houris for a divorced woman indicates that she will not live alone, and this includes either returning to her husband or starting a real relationship. Interpretation of the Houris' eyes in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees Houris in a dream, it means that the newborn will bring with him great sustenance and an indication that childbirth and pregnancy will be in peace. Interpretation of the Houris in a dream for a married woman Seeing the Houris in the dream of a married woman indicates that you are a righteous wife and shows concern for the husband's interests. If a married woman sees beautiful Houris in a dream, this indicates a good relationship with her husband and good management of household affairs. The woman who sees a beautiful Houri, it means that life with her husband will be happy and she will spend happy moments, and even if she faces some problems in her life, these problems will be a test for her from God Almighty. Interpretation of the Houris in a dream for a single woman Seeing poplar trees in the dream of unmarried women or even unmarried young men is evidence of a successful relationship and an imminent marriage. The appearance of the Houris in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates the great tenderness that this girl possesses and is evidence of great femininity and attractiveness. If the unmarried girl sees the Houris, it is evidence of a happy and joyful life and an indication of her success in finding things that bring her positive energy and staying away from things that cause her negative energy. And the unmarried woman who sees the Houris, it indicates her dedication to religious matters and her concern to perform religious duties in the right way, and evidence of her love to learn the basics of religion and everything related to it. In the event that the girl sees the Houris in her dream, this indicates a strong personality and indicates this girl's ability to bear the pressures and responsibilities imposed on her, and an indication that despite this girl having a lot of tenderness and femininity, this does not prevent her from possessing other characteristics such as the ability to manage responsibilities and solve crises or problems that she may face. One of the interpretations of the Houris in a dream is that it also shows that the dreaming woman loves to read books and insists on working to educate herself.

title: Imam Sadiq's Comprehensive Interpretation of Dreams: From A to Z

preview.text: Interpreting your dream according to the alphabetical order of the Arabic alphabet from the book of Imam Ja'far al-Sadiq from letter A to letter Y, all letters, according to the Shi'a sect and others. Look for the letter your dream starts with, then search for your dream in it (Example: Search for the letter B, then search for the interpretation of the chapter in it). Letter A or the Hamza (A): Seeing Ibrahim (Abraham) peace be upon him foretells pilgrimage and the birth of righteous people and warns of safety from hardships and disaster. Seeing a needle: Warns of marriage for the unmarried, covering and money for the poor and needy, and breaking the needle is separation and corruption. Seeing a pitcher: It indicates the repentance of the sinner, the birth of a baby boy in the dream of a pregnant woman, and it is a symbol of laughter, joy, and play. Seeing Iblis: It symbolizes innovation, temptation, committing sins, cunning, deception, division, consuming interest and haram money. Seeing a pear: In its time, it symbolizes sustenance and kindness, the return of the traveler and the absent, the departure of time, worries, illness and evil, and seeing the sick eating a pear warns of healing. Looking at the sacred things: Good news of marriage for the unmarried, divorce for the married, and staying away from sins, disobedience and enmity. Crowded people: Indicates spoiled goods, transgressions and corrupt values, or house theft. Seeing the brother: It symbolizes cooperation in money, trade or work. Performing the testimony: It symbolizes paying off debts and leaving covenants. Keeping the testimony symbolizes greed and hatred and can symbolize illness. Seeing the call to prayer: It foretells pilgrimage, or it may symbolize gossip or accusations of theft, or it may be a sign of nobility and reputation. The ear: The large ear indicates guidance, acceptance and satisfaction. Purple: It symbolizes a pure or wealthy woman who talks a lot and her relatives. The cradle: It indicates corruption, if the dreamer rocks it. Rice: It symbolizes money and profit. The earth: It indicates keeping secrets and safety from fears and dangers, and seeing farmland symbolizes agriculture and fertility, and an eclipse suggests loss and neglect, and vast land is travel. Interpreting a dream of manicure for unmarried women, there are many different interpretations related to seeing an unmarried woman's manicure, depending on what she saw in her dream in different shapes and colors. If she saw herself putting on pink nail polish on her nails beautifully, this indicates that she is waiting for pleasant surprises and is invited to attend happy occasions. As for the red color, it indicates her engagement or marriage to the young man she desires as a partner in her life.

The manicure in the girl's dream symbolizes her excellence and activity on the academic and practical levels, and that she can do many things at the same time, which brings her closer to achieving her hopes and aspirations, to enjoy a bright future full of prosperity and prosperity.

Interpreting a dream of manicure for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin, Ibn Sirin interprets seeing an unmarried woman's manicure as a praiseworthy sign of kindness and the emergence of happy events, if the nail polish looks conservative and attractive. However, if the girl finds that the manicure is not suitable for her and feels unhappy with its appearance, this indicates that she is making some changes in her manicure and her life, but she does not see them as suitable for her.

In addition, the fact that the girl puts on artificial nails with nail polish is a sign that she is going through a psychological crisis and a loss of self-confidence, and a lack of comfort or stability in her current stage of life. She needs support and help so that she can overcome the crisis she is going through.

Interpreting a dream of pink manicure for unmarried women, pink is one of the favorite colors for girls in general, and when they see it in a dream, there are good interpretations that lead to happy events and fill the dreamer's life with joy and the fulfillment of her dreams.

The dream of a pink manicure also calls her to optimism and to expect a bright future full of successes and achievements on the practical and personal levels, and to take a prestigious position in society, through which she will witness love and respect from a large group of people, because she will move to a better stage in her life full of material prosperity and peace of mind, and God knows best.

Interpreting a dream of a purple manicure for unmarried women, the purple manicure in an unmarried woman's dream indicates her unlimited ambition and her constant desire to aspire to a better future and achieve the successes and goals she wants, no matter how much effort and sacrifice it takes. Thanks to this, the dream announces to her that what she desires will be achieved and that she will find a job that suits her skills, and she will find the material and moral performance that will change her life for the better and make her enjoy material prosperity and peace of mind.

The purple color also shows her correct decisions, as she thinks and plans well for everything she has to choose so that she does not miss opportunities that will raise her personal profile and put her in a distinguished position among those around her. Therefore, she is a person who possesses wisdom and composure, and success always accompanies her.

Removing the manicure in a dream for a single woman, if the girl is suffering from problems and disturbances in her life, and she sees that she is removing the manicure from her nails, this is a good omen that the problems and misery will end in her life, and her circumstances will change for the better, and things will be easier, so that she lives in happiness and stability.  Removing dark manicure indicates that she will get rid of the unwanted, as a result of many problems and differences between them, her presence in her life has become a psychological burden on her.

But if she saw herself peeling off the manicure and wanting to remove it completely, this is considered evidence of her need for some changes in her life and to back down from some decisions that she made in a moment of anger or that she did without thinking about things, and therefore the dream warns her against continuing in these wrong choices so that she does not fall into problems.

Interpreting a dream of brown manicure for a single woman, brown nail polish expresses the stability of the visionary's circumstances and her transition from a state of calmness and confidence. On the emotional level, she finds more understanding and appreciation from the other side. And on the practical level, she is able to achieve and acquire a lot of money that will help her achieve what she wants, so that her life is full of happiness and psychological comfort.

Interpreting a dream of red manicure for single women, experts have indicated that the red color is associated with love stories, engagement, and an individual's entry into a love relationship that he passes through the most beautiful feelings and moments. Red nail polish leads to success and achieving the highest degrees, whether on the academic level if she is a student or practically, and she gets the promotion she aspires to, and God knows best.

If the girl is suffering from psychological or health problems at the present time, then after seeing this dream, she has a promise that her health condition will improve significantly and that she will be freed from all the worries and obstacles that trouble her life and cause her. If she saw that someone is putting on her nails with red nail polish, this indicates her need for help and assistance from someone close to her to overcome the ordeal she is going through.

Interpreting a dream of black manicure for a single woman, seeing a black manicure in the dream of a single woman indicates praiseworthy signs that indicate the girl's purity and her choice of friends and choices, so it is difficult for her to make mistakes or to be the center of suspicion around her. However, if the black nail polish looks ugly, it proves her misbehavior and feelings, constant fear and anxiety about revealing her secrets, and God knows best.

Interpreting a dream of applying manicure for unmarried women, if the unmarried woman sees that she is applying a light-colored manicure that suits her very well and is admired by those who see it, this indicates her correct decisions and her successful choices in many aspects of her life, so that she will be successful.

title: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of a dream about a white cat

preview.text: Seeing white cats in a dream means losing love and affection, and other interpretations. We will explain it for a single woman, married woman, pregnant woman, divorced woman, or man, such as catching white cats, seeing a white cat defecating or urinating, or a white cat chasing me or following me home by Ibn Sirin, and more in the continuation of the article below: Interpretation of a White Cat in a Dream White cats in a dream often indicate one thing, which is falling into trouble or being affected by a lot of worry and sadness. This indicates a large percentage of deception and betrayal to a great extent. It is also an indication of a deceitful and deceitful person in your life. The white cat in the dream reflects the character of its owner in the dream, as it indicates that the dreamer is looking for a feeling of tenderness and affection. If it is white and beautiful, it indicates your character, which is vanity and arrogance. If it is stubborn, it is your failure to admit your failure to achieve your ambitions.  Interpretation of the white cat dream as mentioned by the most reliable and famous commentators such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing it in a dream indicates sincerity, eloquence, intimacy, and closeness. The cat is a woman who admires herself and is beautiful. This is what the dream translator Ibn Sirin said. Dreaming of a cat indicates bad luck. If you fail to kill it or drive it away, or if you see a cat attacking you, you will have enemies who will work to slander you and cause you to lose your property. But if you succeed in chasing it away, it means that you will overcome great obstacles and reach wealth and fame. If you see a dirty cat, you will receive bad news about the absent, and some friends will become sick and approach death. But if you remove it from your sight, your friend will recover from the flicker. Seeing a cat for someone may indicate marriage to the beloved with whom he faced problems and obstacles that prevented their marriage, but these obstacles will be resolved later. If you see a white cat trying to attract your attention, this cat is a reflection of yourself who longs for passion, love, affection, and attention. Seeing a beautiful white cat symbolizes your view of yourself. You know you are beautiful and attractive, which makes you arrogant and condescending to those around you. A dream of a very beautiful white cat may symbolize that you are living under the illusion that you will marry someone you desperately want to marry while he is not interested in this marriage. If you see a white cat acting violently, it means you are having difficulty accepting reality and that what you experienced is just an illusion. A violent white cat in a dream reflects your sadness and inability to achieve your aspirations and dreams. Seeing a cat in a dream symbolizes that the hypocrite will approach the fortune teller in reality and negatively affect him. When a cat scratches the viewer in a dream, it warns him of the danger of illness in reality. Seeing a cat in a dream indicates the dreamer's inclination towards independence and his continuous efforts to improve his situation. Seeing a white cat in a dream predicts the kindness and safety that the dreamer will enjoy in reality. The white cat in the dreamer's dream indicates the good and happy news that he will hear soon. Seeing a white cat in a dream symbolizes the successful and profitable deals that the dreamer will make, which will positively reflect on his situation and social and professional status. Seeing a white cat in a dream has many meanings for the dreamer, including that he will meet a cunning person, and this person will seek to exploit him and benefit from him to achieve some individual personal goals. In addition, this person may be willing to get him into a lot of trouble. The white cat in the dream also indicates the different news that the dreamer may receive, but often this news is pleasant and happy. Let's not forget to mention that the white cat in the dream and in the house conveys a lot of goodness, joy, and pleasure to its inhabitants. Seeing a white cat in the house is a happy sign for married couples about the birth of a newborn, and for the unmarried it may be the bride or groom. Ibn Sirin explained to us, in his various interpretations, many meanings and indications that come to the dreamer, about seeing white cats in a dream, which we will quote for you correctly. Interpretation of White Cats in a Dream by Ibn Sirin A white cat in a dream shows a woman that she has a very deceitful friend. The white cat in the dream also indicates deception and lies in life. A woman who is scratched by a white cat in a dream is evidence of a disease that she will suffer from soon. Seeing a white wild cat in a dream is evidence of the bad news that will happen to the dreamer. The white cat also indicates the problems that will happen to the dreamer. If a woman sees a white wild cat in her dream, it is evidence of the weakness and problems she will suffer from. The white cat is a warning from evil spirits and hypocrites who are in life. White cats in a dream also indicate hypocrisy and deception. Seeing a cat and a mouse in a dream is evidence of success in public life. Seeing a cat in a dream indicates independence and self-love in the dreamer's life. The cat in a dream is evidence of great professional development in life. Seeing two cats in a dream that are similar is evidence of a great need to achieve balance in life. A woman hitting a cat in a dream is evidence of her great independence in life and freedom. The woman's victory over the cat in a dream also indicates that she will get rid of the person who controlled her in the past. A woman biting a cat in a dream is evidence of an arrogant woman or girl in her life. Saving a cat from death in a dream is evidence of a desire for freedom. Seeing a cat's green claws in a dream is evidence that she is a woman who is hostile to society in life. A cat in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is admired by himself. Cats in a dream indicate the familiar friend in the dreamer's life. Interpretation of the white cat's attack in a dream A woman who was attacked by a cat in a dream and was able to deal with it, and this is evidence of overcoming enemies. When a white cat attacks the fortune teller in a dream, it warns him of some people who intend to exploit him in reality. The cat's attack on the dreamer indicates many fears and problems that he will face. Also, dreaming of a white cat while sleeping because it attacks or is attacked indicates some people...

title: Interpretation of a turtle dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
html

A turtle in a single woman's dream indicates the emergence of many changes that will occur in the dreamer's life, in addition to overcoming all problems and difficulties, and generally interpretations are not unified for this day through the Egyptian dream interpretation website. We will mention the most important interpretations provided by prominent interpreters.

A turtle in a single woman's dream

Seeing a turtle in a dream and an unmarried woman catches it, the dream symbolizes her approaching marriage to a generous and wealthy person with whom she will live a real happiness.

A large number of scholars of interpretation have stated that the dream expresses the good reputation and reputation that the visionary enjoys among people, and the dream also indicates that he will obtain a large sum of money in the coming period. The dream is the beginning of the happy days that you will live.

The scholar Ibn Shaheen confirmed that the turtle in a dream symbolizes receiving a lot of good news, which will lead to many urgent changes in the dreamer's life.

A turtle in a dream for an unmarried woman for Ibn Sirin

Green turtles in the dream of an unmarried woman prove that she possesses a lot of money , and the green color indicates the acquisition of dollars. Ibn Sirin also confirmed that the turtle indicates that the dreamer has a lot of good morals, which makes her beloved in her social environment.

The turtle symbolizes the happy life that the visionary will live, but if the unmarried woman sees the turtle enter the kitchen, this indicates a significant increase in livelihood in addition to obtaining a benefit, and the dream in general indicates stability in life, and if she is looking for a new job, then the dream predicts that she will find a new job.

If the dreamer is suffering from worries and sorrows in her life, then the dream warns of being liberated from the worries and burdens of life, and her life will witness unprecedented stability, and God Almighty will grant her reassurance and tranquility.

The turtle in the dream of an unmarried woman is an indication of her closeness to God Almighty, as she will have a high position in the society she lives in and she will be able to prove herself and confront all those who disappointed her.

The death of a turtle in a single woman's dream

The death of a turtle in the dream of an unmarried woman indicates that she will face many problems in the coming period and will find herself unable to keep up with it. The interpretation of the dream in the dream of the fiancée indicates the cancellation of the engagement. The death of the turtle in the dream symbolizes bad luck and exposure to a health problem.

The turtle's bite in a single woman's dream

The bite of a turtle in the dream of an unmarried woman is a good omen that her marriage is approaching from the right man with whom she will find true happiness, but if she is actually engaged, then the dream warns of her marriage to this person who loves. The dream shows the high position that the visionary will reach.

The birth of a turtle in a single woman's dream

If the unmarried woman sees the birth of a turtle in a dream, this indicates that many good opportunities will appear before the dreamer, but he must take advantage of them well until he finally reaches a high position.

The birth of a turtle in the home of an unmarried woman is an indication of an improvement in the dreamer's emotional relationship and also an improvement in her work, through gaining a close insight into her work. In general, the dream has good news about reaching good news in the dreamer's life, and God Almighty will answer the prayers that she persisted in for a long time. .

Fear of turtles in a single woman's dream

When the unmarried woman dreams that she is afraid of the turtle, this indicates that she constantly exaggerates the issues of her life and feels unjustified anxiety and fear, which makes her miss the most important moments of her life and does not do so. Feel happy Fear of the turtle is a warning of imminent danger in the dreamer's life.

Fear of a wild turtle in a dream indicates that there are people who hate the woman and do not wish her any good, and the dream also symbolizes a feeling of confusion, fear and inability to make the right decisions, because she always feels that she is. Getting involved in trouble.

Interpretation of a dream of a large turtle

A large turtle in a single woman's dream is a sign that she will be exposed to a big issue in her life, and it is important for her to have strength and wisdom to overcome it. The large turtle for the single woman is a sign of her marriage to a smart and religious man close to God Almighty.

The dream shows that she is currently planning something, and although she is worried about failure, she will be able to achieve it and she will be able to prove herself. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the large turtle in the dream is a sign of getting rid of the negative things that have controlled the visionary's reality for a long time.

A large green turtle in a dream is an indication that the dreamer has overcome all difficulties and problems. The large turtle is a sign of prosperity and happiness that will dominate the dreamer's life, it symbolizes concern for knowledge, so it reaches a prestigious position in a short period of time.

Interpretation of a dream of a small turtle

The small turtle in a single woman's dream indicates entering into an emotional relationship, but if she is already in a relationship, then this relationship will witness disturbances and changes. The interpretation of a dream of a small turtle indicates a large increase in money.

The small green turtle indicates that she will obtain a lot of money in the near future, in addition to the happiness that will dominate her life, and seeing the small green turtle indicates that she will find a new job in the near future.

Feeding a turtle in a dream

Feeding a turtle in a dream is one of those dreams that carries many meanings. Here are the most important of them:

  • Feeding a turtle in a dream indicates that the visionary is dealing with good people who wish her the best.
  • Feeding a turtle in a dream for a single woman is a sign that she is currently working to improve her financial circumstances in different ways in order to pay off her debts.
  • Feeding a turtle in a dream indicates that the dreamer is dealing with her life problems with great wisdom in order to get out of them with the least loss.
  • Among the interpretations highlighted by Ibn Sirin is that the visionary receives a lot of good news that will cause many positive changes in the dreamer's life.

title: "Dream interpretation of being drunk in a dream - seeing someone drunk in a dream"

preview.text: A dream about being drunk indicates that you will show indifference to what is happening around you. Other interpretations that we will mention regarding the single woman, the single man, the married, the pregnant, and the divorced, such as seeing a brother drunk, or a husband, or a drunk lover, or a drunk father, or I dreamed of being drunk or a drunk chasing me, and a dead man drinking wine, for the great Arab dream interpreters, like Ibn Sirin and others, in continuation of the topic: Seeing a drunkard in a dream. Among the different and frightening dreams that we see in a dream, which carry many important clues to reach the dreamer, as wine is a forbidden drink in all heavenly religions, which God and His Messenger forbade in the Qur'an. and Sunnah, and let us Messenger of Allah, peace be upon him, not drink it because it takes away the mind, and makes the person ignorant of all his actions, and therefore causes many problems to those around him. After that, we will examine for you the interpretation of seeing a drunkard in a dream, as explained by Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing a person drunk in a dream means that there will be positive changes in your life in matters that you did not expect to happen. Seeing a person drunk in a dream is evidence of kindness, if the dreamer feels that he is in a state of tension and sadness because he drank wine and got drunk. Seeing a faithful person drunk in a dream is evidence of his good coming in all matters of life. As it is shown. Drinking alcohol in a dream is a reward for the good man in the case of the elixir of his heart and his culture. Seeing wine in a dream means that money and blessings will come to the seer without any effort. And it indicates drunkenness in a dream accompanied by people with positions and money. Seeing a religious person drunk in a dream is evidence of his great love for God and His Messenger. And the merchant who trades in the permitted drinking of wine in a dream is evidence of acquiring livelihood, blessing, and money in the near future. Seeing a scholar drunk in a dream is evidence of a great increase in his knowledge. Seeing a sick person drunk in a dream. Details of the treatment of the disease. Drinking grape wine is a sign of good, blessing, and money coming to the dreamer. Expressing wine in a dream is evidence of the person serving the king or sultan in the near future. Seeing the dreamer drunk from wine and tearing his clothes is evidence that he is a person who longs for blessings. Seeing a merchant drunk from drinking alcohol in a dream is evidence of the unlawful money he will get. As for the transgressor, he drinks wine and drinks in a dream, this is evidence of theft and the great bribe that he will offer. Seeing him in a dream that he is drunk without drinking alcohol is evidence of fear and anxiety in the person's life about the future. Seeing a dreamer drunk from drinking wine in a dream is evidence that you are approaching those in positions of authority in a forbidden way. Drunkenness in a dream is evidence of ignorance in the dreamer's life. Who knows the dead drunk in a dream, and this indicates that the dead is in comfort and pleasure in the Hereafter, if he drank wine from the people of Paradise, otherwise he died and he intended it, or he was in his worldly life for whom he considered it permissible. Also, drunkenness in a dream indicates great plots and hypocrisy around the dreamer, so he must be careful. Who saw him? A father drunk in a dream, and this indicates good, taking over power, a lot of money, and abundance of livelihood for this father and his family. Seeing a brother drunk in a dream, and he is evidence that this brother will receive a lot of benefit and a lot of sustenance in the Hereafter. As you see the beloved is drunk in a dream, it is a sign of fear and awe of Allah Almighty. Dreaming of a husband drunk in a dream is an indication of the emergence of a problem that will lead to a big competition that will appear to him with a strong person. Drinking wine in a dream is evidence of the unlawful money that the person will acquire unlawfully. As for drinking wine after an argument in a dream, it is evidence of the disputes that the person is exposed to. Drinking wine in a dream is evidence of the great sins that the person will commit. Seeing wine without eating it in a dream is evidence of temptation, sins, and gossip that spreads in the place. Also, seeing alcohol without drinking it is evidence of lying and hypocrisy. Seeing a sinner drinking wine in a dream is evidence of committing major sins. Wine in a dream is evidence of a bad woman in the dreamer's life, and he should be careful. Interpretation of a dream about a drunkard If you are drunk in a dream, this is a warning that your cheerful nature will make you ignore the worries of life. If you see others drunk, it means that you are not interested in the behavior and actions of your companions. Seeing drinking wine in a dream is meant by unlawful money and its profits, and it is without hardship or the least effort. It is said that drinking alcohol without a competitor or opponent drinking it indicates unlawful money, and a dispute with another person about the seer indicates drinking alcohol in a dream in return for legal money, which others compete for, and the amount of competition for money corresponds to the amount of competition and dispute between the seer and this person about drinking alcohol in a dream. As for Al-Nabulsi, he did not differ much in his opinion from what Ibn Sirin said, as he said that wine in a dream is forbidden money, and drinking it may indicate sin or great sin, or great and vast sustenance, based on the state of the dreamer's piety and his closeness or distance from Allah Almighty. Drinking forbidden wine without dispute, and drinking it in the presence of a competitor symbolizes competition and a lot of talk. As for Ibn Shaheen, he did not add to the words and interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, except that he said that seeing the dreamer drinking wine until he drinks from it and loses his balance indicates that he took forbidden money, emphasizing that, and it is not required that forbidden money be only questionable money, but stolen money or confiscated orphan money is forbidden money. Drinking wine in a dream symbolizes sorrow, distress, and sadness, and getting drunk from wine in a dream shows wealth with the dreamer's arrogance and his rebellion against money until it is lost, and seeing the same person drunk in a dream and tearing his clothes indicates the loss of his money and the loss of blessings from his life. Seeing a man in his dream as if he drank wine until he drank with it means that the dreamer acquires forbidden money, and that he will gain benefit, fame, and great power from this forbidden money. And seeing drunk from drinking wine symbolizes money, prestige, and great power. As for seeing a person as if he were drunk in a dream without seeing himself drinking wine, this means great fear and insecurity. And drunkenness in a dream symbolizes great ignorance, and seeing drunkenness in a dream for those who are afraid of something is a good thing, and seeing a person in his dream as if he claims to be drunk while he is not drunk and not drunk. The drinker says that he is betraying and claims that he can do something when he cannot do it at all. It may also indicate that he was afflicted with a calamity that turns him over and takes away his mind until he gets drunk and does not drink wine. But if the seer is righteous and sees himself in a dream that overpowers him. Drunkenness, this indicates that his heart is filled with the love of Allah Almighty. ...
